api_list.api_description: Fetches all characters, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of characters to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Filter by gender (female, male, genderless, unknown).

query: Can you provide a list of anime reports that start with the letter 'A' and also fetch all characters from the 'Rick and Morty' universe?

api_list.api_description: Fetch detailed info for anime/manga by ID or name.
Fetches all episodes, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of episodes to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

query: Can you find detailed information about the anime with the ID '4658', and also give me a list of all episodes of the 'Rick and Morty' series?
